entryInfo.hudium-config.displayHealthVal: Specify whether the health value will be displayed.
entryInfo.hudium-config.displayHungerVal: Specify whether the hunger value will be displayed.
entryInfo.hudium-config.displaySaturatio: Specify whether the saturation value will be displayed.
entryInfo.hudium-config.displayArmorValu: Specify whether the armor value will be displayed.
entryInfo.hudium-config.displayAirValue: Specify whether the air value will be displayed.
entryInfo.hudium-config.displayTextColor: Specify the hex value of the info text colour.
entryInfo.hudium-config.displayInfoX: Specify the x coordinate the info is going to be placed.
entryInfo.hudium-config.displayInfoY: Specify the y coordinate the info is going to be placed.
entryInfo.hudium-config.displayBlockInfo: Specify whether the block info will be displayed.
entryInfo.hudium-config.displayFluidInfo: Specify whether the fluid info will be displayed.
entryInfo.hudium-config.displayEntityInf: Specify whether the entity info will be displayed.
entryInfo.hudium-config.displayDurabilit: Specify whether the durability info will be displayed.
entryInfo.hudium-config.displayCoordinat: Specify whether the player coordinates and direction will be displayed.
entryInfo.hudium-config.displayFrameRate: Specify whether FPS will be displayed.
entryInfo.hudium-config.displayNetworkLa: Specify whether Ping will be displayed.
entryInfo.hudium-config.displayBiomeInfo: Specify whether the biome info will be displayed.
entryInfo.hudium-config.displayGameTime: Specify whether the in-game time will be displayed.
entryInfo.hudium-config.displayBGMInfo: Specify whether the currently playing BGM will be displayed.
entryInfo.hudium-config.holdToolsForInfo: Specify whether specific tools are required holding in hands for some info.
entryInfo.hudium-config.alternateBossBar: Specify whether coordinates and direction will be rendered in an alternative way.
entryInfo.hudium-config.renderShadowForT: Specify whether shadow should be rendered for text.
entryInfo.hudium-config.floatAndDoubleSh: Specify the show mode of float values and double values. Can only be ACCURATE, SEMI_ACCURATE or INTEGER. (For now only used in entity health)
